attributes.action: make it compulsory for all MP's to state any previous association with other MP's prior to their being elected
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many MP's appear to have attended the same University or worked for the same company as fellow MP's this could lead to people being promoted not by ability but by croneyism. If we were told of previous asociations we could judge to what extent this took place
